Problematic assumption: The claim assumes the existence of Santiago Flight 513 and its subsequent landing with skeletons without providing any verifiable evidence.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there are no news reports or credible evidence supporting the existence of Santiago Flight 513 or its landing with skeletons.
